string-array.item: Hey welcome to LivePost! LivePost is all about covering news stories in real time and sharing them with the world.
We\'re going to do a quick walkthrough of how to create a story. Let\'s start off by clicking on “Your 1st Story” to give it a catchy title.
Awesome! Now click on “Pick a Category” up top to choose what your story is about.
Looking good! We added an image to your story, but you can change it later by long pressing it and adding your own.
Ok, so now all that\'s missing is your profile. Click on the profile picture to set it up.
Nice pic! Now hit “Publish” to choose if you want to publish your story on your blog or on the LivePost News website.
Great you\’re ready to start telling your story. Let\’s try sending a photo.
Click on the camera button down below to open your phone\’s camera and take a photo.
Nice! Tip: Long pressing images will give you several options. Try deleting that last image.
